original_text: I will bring you into the wilderness of the nations and there, face to face, I will execute judgment upon you.
korean_text: 너희를 인도하여 여러 나라 광야에 이르러 거기에서 너희를 대면하여 심판하되

sentences.original_text: I will bring you into the wilderness of the nations
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 이방의 광야로 이끌 것이며

sentences.original_text: I will execute judgment upon you
